title_en: Robust and Efficient Penetration-Free Elastodynamics without Barriers
title_zh: 无需屏障的鲁棒高效无穿透弹性动力学模拟
summary_en: We introduce a barrier-free optimization framework for non-penetration elastodynamic simulation that matches the robustness of Incremental Potential Contact (IPC) while overcoming its two primary efficiency bottlenecks: (1) reliance on logarithmic barrier functions to enforce non-penetration constraints, which leads to ill-conditioned systems and significantly slows down the convergence of iterative linear solvers; and (2) the time-of-impact (TOI) locking issue, which restricts active-set exploration in collision-intensive scenes and requires a large number of Newton iterations. We propose a novel second-order constrained optimization framework featuring a custom augmented Lagrangian solver that avoids TOI locking by immediately incorporating all requisite contact pairs detected via CCD, enabling more efficient active-set exploration and leading to significantly fewer Newton iterations. By adaptively updating Lagrange multipliers rather than increasing penalty stiffness, our method prevents stagnation at zero TOI while maintaining a well-conditioned system. We further introduce a constraint filtering and decay mechanism to keep the active set compact and stable, along with a theoretical justification of our method's finite-step termination and first-order time integration accuracy under a cumulative TOI-based termination criterion. A comprehensive set of experiments demonstrates the efficiency, robustness, and accuracy of our method. With a GPU-optimized simulator design, our method achieves an up to 103x speedup over GIPC on challenging, contact-rich benchmarks - scenarios that were previously tractable only with barrier-based methods. Our code and data will be open-sourced.
summary_zh: 本文提出一种无屏障优化框架，用于非穿透弹性动力学模拟。该框架在保持增量势能接触法鲁棒性的同时，克服了其两个主要效率瓶颈：（1）依赖对数屏障函数强制执行非穿透约束，导致系统病态并显著降低迭代线性求解器的收敛速度；（2）碰撞时间锁定问题，该问题限制了密集碰撞场景中的有效集探索，并需要大量牛顿迭代。我们提出了一种新颖的二阶约束优化框架，采用定制化的增广拉格朗日求解器，通过即时纳入连续碰撞检测发现的所有必要接触对来避免碰撞时间锁定，从而实现更高效的有效集探索并大幅减少牛顿迭代次数。通过自适应更新拉格朗日乘子而非增加惩罚刚度，我们的方法在保持系统良态的同时防止了零碰撞时间停滞现象。我们进一步引入约束过滤与衰减机制以保持有效集的紧凑性和稳定性，并从理论上证明了基于累积碰撞时间的终止准则下，本方法具有有限步终止性和一阶时间积分精度。一系列综合实验验证了本方法的高效性、鲁棒性与精确性。通过GPU优化的模拟器设计，本方法在具有挑战性的密集接触基准测试中相比GIPC实现了最高103倍的加速——此类场景以往仅能通过基于屏障的方法处理。我们的代码与数据将开源发布。
